name: Peace of Mind (Team Hummingbird)
description:
Peace of Mind is about the zen experience of cleaning.

Target Audience

For anyone looking for a relaxing, low-stakes experience.

How to Play

Bring color into the space by cleaning the whole apartment. Click on messes to clean them. Some items may have to be clicked on several times.

Game Tips

  • Some of these objects are tricky to clean. You may have to approach them from a different angle or distance
  • Some objects bring color but others do not.
  • Make sure you click on almost everything!

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse Move: Look around
  • Left Mouse Button: Pick up/clean

Team

Leo Herrera - Designer/ Additional Programming

Eddie Mustafa - Gameplay Programmer

Thor Bremer - Sound Designer/Composer

Zach Kolman - Environment Art

Please report any game-breaking bugs on this itch.io page.

Enjoy!
